thread.title: Volvo XC40 SUV wins Car of the Year at Motor Show

title: Volvo XC40 SUV wins Car of the Year at Motor Show
text:
Volvo XC40 SUV wins Car of the Year at Motor Show 1:04am IST - 01:37 
The Volvo XC40 has been crowned the 2018 Car of the Year by a pan-European panel of judges at the Geneva Motor Show. As Ciara Lee reports, not all auto makers at the event are celebrating as they brace for possible U.S. trade tariffs and diesel bans.
